entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
